section.name: Bug Reporting
section.p: If you find bugs, or would like to submit a request for enhancement, you should post them to the fissures-dev email list. General discussions should also take place via the fissures-dev@iris.washington.edu email list. This is a majordomo email list that you should subscribe to. Send an email to majordomo@iris.washington.edu with

Please remember that if you send an email to fissures-dev, it goes to everyone on the list. So if you are trying to subscribe or unsubscribe you should send the email to
majordomo@iris.washington.edu instead.
